members.joinCircumstances: Hammond is a member of the New Fish-Man Pirates when they first appear.

keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Intercept the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Hammond and other members of the New Fish-Man Pirates confront the Straw Hat Pirates at Fish-Man Island's entrance, revealing their knowledge of the crew's past actions.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the New Fish-Man Pirates, establishing them as the primary antagonists of the Fish-Man Island arc.

keyMoments.title: Ultimatum to the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Through Hammond, the New Fish-Man Pirates issue an ultimatum to the Straw Hats: join them as subordinates or be destroyed.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the hostile intentions of the New Fish-Man Pirates and sets up the arc's central conflict.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a crown-like fin on top

members.joinCircumstances: Vander Decken IX is the captain of the Flying Pirates.
Wadatsumi serves under Vander Decken IX.
Ankoro is one of Vander Decken's giant sea creatures.

keyMoments.title: Flying Dutchman Appears
keyMoments.description: The legendary Flying Dutchman ghost ship appears with Vander Decken IX as the Straw Hats descend toward Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the Flying Pirates and their legendary ship.

keyMoments.title: Attack on the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX orders Wadatsumi to destroy the Thousand Sunny, initiating a confrontation with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: First hostile action by the Flying Pirates against the Straw Hat crew.

ships.description: A legendary ghost ship, infamous in maritime folklore. The main vessel of the Flying Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates reach Fish-Man Island, a major milestone on their journey to the New World.
keyMoments.significance: The crew reaches a location that has been built up since the beginning of the series, marking significant progress in their journey.

keyMoments.title: Confrontation with New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: The crew is intercepted by Hammond and the New Fish-Man Pirates at the entrance to Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's reputation precedes them, and they face immediate hostility from the local pirate crew.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
